org.wmn4j.notation.builders

Class MeasureBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wmn4j.notation.builders.MeasureBuilder

  • public class MeasureBuilder
extends Object
    Class for building Measure objects. The builder does not ensure that the DurationalBuilder objects in the builder fill up exactly a measure that has the set time signature. The methods isFull and isVoiceFull should be used for checking if the durations add up to the correct Default values: TimeSignature : 4/4 KeySignature : C-major/a-minor Clef: G Barlines (right and left): Single. No clef changes.
    Author:
    Otso Bj√∂rklund

        public MeasureBuilder addToVoice(int voice,

        builder - DurationalBuilder object to be appended to voice.
        Returns:
        reference to this builder.

      • get

        public DurationalBuilder get(int voice,
                             int index)
        Get a reference to the DurationalBuilder at the specified position.
        Parameters:
        voice - the number of the voice from which to get the object.
        index - index in the voice.
        Returns:
        reference to the DurationalBuilder at the position specified by the parameters.

      • totalDurationOfVoice

        public Duration totalDurationOfVoice(int voice)
        Get the sum of durations on a voice.
        Parameters:
        voice - the index of the voice.
        Returns:
        Sum of the durations of the Durational objects on the voice.

      • isVoiceFull

        public boolean isVoiceFull(int voice)
        Check if voice is full. A voice is considered full when it contains DurationalBuilder objects whose combined duration is enough to fill a measure that has the time signature that is set for this builder.
        Parameters:
        voice - index of voice that is checked.
        Returns:
        true if the durations in the voice add up to fill a measure. False otherwise.

      • isFull

        public boolean isFull()
        Check if any voice in this builder is full.
        Returns:
        true if even a single voice is full. False otherwise.

      • build

        public Measure build()
        Create a Measure with the contents of this builder.
        Returns:
        Measure that has the set attributes and contains Durational objects built using the contained DurationalBuilder objects.
